articles.title: Scottish Premiership: Celtic beaten at Livingston, Rangers held by Motherwell - The Guardian
articles.description: Celtic lost their sixth away game out of seven, while Rangers were held 1-1 by Motherwell at Ibrox
articles.content:
Rangers dropped league points at Ibrox for the first time since March 2020 as they were held by Motherwell, but Celtic could not take advantage as they lost 1-0 at Livingston.

articles.title: Man faces death over huge jelly biceps - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: A Russian man dubbed “Popeye” has been warned he faces death unless he has lumps of hardened petroleum jelly from his bulging fake biceps removed.
